X.ii.6.A.5.f
.
Referral to a Hub After Reinstating Benefits for a Beneficiary With a Continued Finding of Incompetency
When an incompetent beneficiary’s benefits are reinstated with a continued finding of incompetency, as directed in
M21-1 Part X, Subpart ii, 6.A.5.d
and
e
, notify the hub of jurisdiction via the appropriate hub mailbox as indicated in
FPM, Part I, 1.A.2.a
.
Note
:  The hub will consider whether the prior failure to submit necessary information for continuance of benefits indicates the need for appointment of a different fiduciary.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section A - Evaluating and Rating Competency
